Detailed Description

Descriptor for pFluidEmitter class. Used for saving and loading the emitter state.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

(Re)sets the structure to the default.

bool pFluidEmitterDesc::isValid (  )  const

Returns true if the current settings are valid.

Member Data Documentation

CK3dEntity* pFluidEmitterDesc::frameShape

A pointer to the shape to which the emitter is attached to.

If this pointer is set to NULL, the emitter is attached to the world frame. The shape must be in the same scene as the emitter.

pEmitterType pFluidEmitterDesc::type

The emitter's mode of operation.

Either the simulation enforces constant pressure or constant flow rate at the emission site, given the velocity of emitted particles.

See also:
NxEmitterType
int pFluidEmitterDesc::maxParticles

The maximum number of particles which are emitted from this emitter.

If the total number of particles in the fluid already hit the maxParticles parameter of the fluid, this maximal values can't be reached.

If set to 0, the number of emitted particles is unrestricted.

pEmitterShape pFluidEmitterDesc::shape

The emitter's shape can either be rectangular or elliptical.

See also:
pEmitterShape
float pFluidEmitterDesc::dimensionX

The sizes of the emitter in the directions of the first and the second axis of its orientation frame (relPose).

The dimensions are actually the radii of the size.

VxVector pFluidEmitterDesc::randomPos

Random vector with values for each axis direction of the emitter orientation.

The values have to be positive and describe the maximal random particle displacement in each dimension.

The z value describes the randomization in emission direction. The emission direction is specified by the third orientation axis of relPose.

float pFluidEmitterDesc::randomAngle

Random angle deviation from emission direction.

The emission direction is specified by the third orientation axis of relPose.

Unit: Radians

float pFluidEmitterDesc::fluidVelocityMagnitude

The velocity magnitude of the emitted fluid particles.

float pFluidEmitterDesc::rate

The rate specifies how many particles are emitted per second.

The rate is only considered in the simulation if the type is set to PFET_ConstantFlowRate.

See also:
NxEmitterType
float pFluidEmitterDesc::particleLifetime

This specifies the time in seconds an emitted particle lives.

If set to 0, each particle will live until it collides with a drain.

float pFluidEmitterDesc::repulsionCoefficient

Defines a factor for the impulse transfer from attached emitter to body.

Only has an effect if PFEF_ForceOnBody is set.

Default: 1.0
Range: [0,inf)

See also:
PFEF_ForceOnBody NxFluidEmitter.setRepulsionCoefficient()
pFluidEmitterFlag pFluidEmitterDesc::flags

A combination of pFluidEmitterFlags.

See also:
pFluidEmitterFlag
